Html:
I want to know if we have the right (xD) to rebuild the application extension/assembly (FirstFloor.ModernUI.dll) with another name (example: MyApplication.UI.dll).
If we do have the right, how to do this?
I know I have to go to Project > Properties > Application Tab > Assembly name, and change the name..., but then, how do I use the new (renamed) assembly (*.dll) in my project.
Note: Using the same technique as in the documentation, doesn't work.
Thanks!
Have you consulted the license?
